user.title: Welcome to AvoidBlackout
user.description:
Protect your electrical network by managing excess loads.

Do you want to enable Test Mode (test_mode)? In this mode, devices will not actually be turned off, but you will receive notifications only.

sensors.title: Power Sensors
sensors.description: Select the sensors that measure total power consumption (W). You can select multiple sensors; their values will be summed.

threshold.title: Threshold and Debounce
threshold.description: Set the maximum power limit and the wait time before intervention.

devices.title: Devices to Manage
devices.description: Select the devices to turn off in order of priority (the first one in the list will be turned off first).

error.invalid_power_sensors: One or more selected sensors are invalid.
error.no_devices_selected: You must select at least one device to manage.
error.duplicate_device: Duplicate device selected. Select each device only once.

reorder.title: Reorder Priority
reorder.description:
Assign priority position for each device. The device at position 0 will be the first to be turned off.
You have {count} devices to assign.
